trans-unit.source: Install Update 1 from the Azure Management Portal
trans-unit.target: Install Update 1 from the Azure Management Portal

trans-unit.source: Explains how to use the Management Portal to install StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use the Management Portal to install StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.

trans-unit.source: To install Update 1 from the Management Portal
trans-unit.target: To install Update 1 from the Management Portal

trans-unit.source: On the StorSimple service page, select your device.
trans-unit.target: On the StorSimple service page, select your device.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to **Devices** > **Maintenance**.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to **Devices** > **Maintenance**.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the page, click **Scan Updates**.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the page, click **Scan Updates**.

trans-unit.source: A job will be created to scan for available updates.
trans-unit.target: A job will be created to scan for available updates.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified when the job has completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified when the job has completed successfully.

trans-unit.source: In the **Software Updates** section on the same page, you will see that new software updates are available.
trans-unit.target: In the **Software Updates** section on the same page, you will see that new software updates are available.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you review the release notes before you apply Update 1.0 on your device.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you review the release notes before you apply Update 1.0 on your device.

trans-unit.source: Install software updates
trans-unit.target: Install software updates

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the page, click **Install Updates**.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the page, click **Install Updates**.

trans-unit.source: You will be prompted for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: You will be prompted for confirmation.

trans-unit.source: Click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: An **Install Updates** dialog box will be presented.
trans-unit.target: An **Install Updates** dialog box will be presented.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that your device satisfies the checks listed in this dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that your device satisfies the checks listed in this dialog box.

trans-unit.source: Select **I understand the above requirement and am ready to update my device**.
trans-unit.target: Select **I understand the above requirement and am ready to update my device**.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon.

trans-unit.source: Confirmation message
trans-unit.target: Confirmation message

trans-unit.source: You will be notified that pre-update checks are in progress.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified that pre-update checks are in progress.

trans-unit.source: Pre-check notification
trans-unit.target: Pre-check notification

trans-unit.source: The following is an example in which the pre-upgrade check failed.
trans-unit.target: The following is an example in which the pre-upgrade check failed.

trans-unit.source: You will need to verify that both the device controllers are healthy and online.
trans-unit.target: You will need to verify that both the device controllers are healthy and online.

trans-unit.source: You will also need to check the health of the hardware components.
trans-unit.target: You will also need to check the health of the hardware components.

trans-unit.source: In this example, Controller 0 and Controller 1 components need attention.
trans-unit.target: In this example, Controller 0 and Controller 1 components need attention.

trans-unit.source: You may need to contact Microsoft Support if you cannot address these issues by yourself.
trans-unit.target: You may need to contact Microsoft Support if you cannot address these issues by yourself.

trans-unit.source: Pre-check failed
trans-unit.target: Pre-check failed

trans-unit.source: After the pre-upgrade checks are successfully completed, an update job will be created.
trans-unit.target: After the pre-upgrade checks are successfully completed, an update job will be created.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified when the update job is successfully created.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified when the update job is successfully created.

trans-unit.source: Update job creation
trans-unit.target: Update job creation

trans-unit.source: The update will then be applied on your device.
trans-unit.target: The update will then be applied on your device.

trans-unit.source: To monitor the progress of the update job, click **View Job**.
trans-unit.target: To monitor the progress of the update job, click **View Job**.

trans-unit.source: On the Jobs page, you can see the update progress.
trans-unit.target: On the Jobs page, you can see the update progress.

trans-unit.source: Update job progress
trans-unit.target: Update job progress

trans-unit.source: The update will take a few hours to complete.
trans-unit.target: The update will take a few hours to complete.

trans-unit.source: You can view the details of the job at any time.
trans-unit.target: You can view the details of the job at any time.

trans-unit.source: Update job details
trans-unit.target: Update job details

trans-unit.source: After the job is complete, navigate to the **Maintenance** page and scroll down to **Software Updates**.
trans-unit.target: After the job is complete, navigate to the **Maintenance** page and scroll down to **Software Updates**.

trans-unit.source: Verify that your device is running **StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.0 (6.3.9600.17491)**.
trans-unit.target: Verify that your device is running **StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.0 (6.3.9600.17491)**.

trans-unit.source: The **Last updated date** should also be modified.
trans-unit.target: The **Last updated date** should also be modified.

trans-unit.source: Maintenance page
trans-unit.target: Maintenance page
